item.title: MIUI V12.0.4.0.RKGINXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 10 India
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 10 India

Codename: mojito

Version: V12.0.4.0.RKGINXM | 11.0

Size: 3.3 GB

MD5: 6393b84337bf7a5a5d83116996363f28

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to May 2021. Increased system security.
[Xiaomi Cloud]
New: Location info can be now reported automatically before the device is powered off

Download: Here
